description:
Worldwide coverage cloud map.
The visualizations is composed of imagery from geostationary satellites: Meteosat 0 Degree, Meteosat IODC, GOES-16, GOES-17, Himawari-8.
title: Geostationary Ring Convection RGB - Multimission

providers.name: European Organisation for the Exploitation of Meteorological Satellites (EUMETSAT)
